title: Fix Authenticator interface

Fix Authenticator interface

Weird issue: the new Kotlin Authenticator did not correctly override the `addAccount` method from AbstractAccountAuthenticator, so Android assumes we do not support adding accounts at all. The difference lies in the @Nullable annotation in the method arguments, very difficult to spot.

title: Use OkHttp's CookieJar and Interceptor to manage session
message:
Use OkHttp's CookieJar and Interceptor to manage session

The cookie jar automatically gets a session ID from the AccountManager,
and the interceptor automatically intercepts every request and throws an
exception when the session is expired.

Callers of the XTimeWebservice can catch the SessionExpiredException to
invalidate the session and retry the request with a fresh session.

Apparently you cannot add fragments programmatically to the default layout, using android.R.id.content. See: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18593939/actionbarcompat-and-dynamic-fragments.

Hide duplicate time sheet descriptions.

XTime returns incorrect descriptions for months that are already approved. The description is always equal to the work type description in that case. The parser now filters out these duplicate descriptions.

title: Changed action bar navigation to fix text color for spinner dialogs.
message:
Changed action bar navigation to fix text color for spinner dialogs.

The dialog text color was inverted to make sure the action bar navigation list had white text. This had the unintended side effect that all spinners had white text in their dropdrop dialogs.

 The issue is fixed by resetting the spinner dropdown item style, and using a special layout for the action bar navigation list. This layout is copied from the default android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item file,  but with inverted text color so it matches the rest of the action bar style.

title: Created overview activity for week and month overviews
message:
Created overview activity for week and month overviews

The WeekOverviewActivity was discarded in favor of a general overview activity. The user can switch between the default week overview fragment and a new month overview fragment.

A workaround was required to make sure the viewpager for the week overview fragment in this new setting. The FragmentWithChildFragmentManager resets the ChildFragmentManager whenever the fragment is attached to a layout. Without this workaround, the viewpager would not refresh when the user navigated to the week overview fragment.

To keep the EditTimeSheetFragment as compact as possible, the SaveEntryTask was also moved out of the EditTimeSheetFragment.

Fixes issue #3.

title: Fixed issue with importing the project in Android Studio.
message:
Fixed issue with importing the project in Android Studio.

The build.gradle was using the System.console() to read the passwords for signing releases. This caused a NullPointerException in Android Studio, making it impossible to import the project.

The solution is lifted from https://www.timroes.de/2013/09/22/handling-signing-configs-with-gradle/. The signingConfig information is moved to misc/signing/signing.gradle file, which is not version controlled. The build.gradle has been modified so that the release signing config is only set up when the signing.gradle file is present on the system. On other systems, no errors are thrown anymore.
